sentences.en: Farmers are being encouraged to diversify into new crops.
sentences.cn: 目前正鼓励农民兼种新的农作物。

sentences.en: Hills and woods diversify the landscape.
In recent years, farm households have begun to diversify their sources of income.
sentences.cn: 在最近几年里, 农民家庭已开始使他们的收入来源多样化.

sentences.en: Manufacturers have been encouraged to diversify.
sentences.cn: 制造商们被鼓励要做到产品多样化。

sentences.en: Our company is trying to diversify.
sentences.cn: 我们公司正力图往多样化方面发展.

sentences.en: Our factory is trying to diversify its range of products.
sentences.cn: 我们厂正设法增加产品的品种.
人们应分散投资在几家公司.

sentences.en: The first thing is for you to learn diversify your talents.
sentences.cn: 你首先应该学会多方面发展才能.

sentences.en: The key word here is diversify; don't put all your eggs in one basket.
sentences.cn: 这里的关键词是多样性；不要在一棵树上吊死。

sentences.en: The tools of restructuring can be used to diversify or concentrate product lines.
sentences.cn: 调整结构可以便产品多样化,或使产品集中.

sentences.en: These firms have been given a tough lesson in the need to diversify their markets.
sentences.cn: 这些公司因缺乏多元化市场而遭受惨痛的教训。

sentences.en: To diversify one's business is to embark on different kinds of commercial business.
sentences.cn: 多样化就是从事各式各样的商业经营.

sentences.en: User requirements have diversified over the years.
sentences.cn: 这几年来，用户需求已经多样化。
我们必须使产品多样化.

sentences.en: We must try to diversify the syllabus to attract more students.
sentences.cn: 我们应该使教学大纲内容多样化,可以多吸引学生.

sentences.en: We need to diversify the economy.
Woman: Make sure to 4 diversify to protect your money.
sentences.cn: 女: 投资一定要多样化,你的钱才有保障.

words.tran_cn: 不同种类的，各式各样的
不同的；多种多样的；变化多的
使多样化，使变化；增加产品种类以扩大

trans.tran_en: if a business, company, country etc diversifies, it increases the range of goods or services it produces
